title: Air Filter Element - Installation

body.body: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Clean the air filter cover and interior of the airbox.
Locate the new filter element into the air filter cassette, as noted for removal.
Fit the air filter and cassette assembly into the airbox.
Refit the air filter cover and tighten its fixings to
Refit the engine breather hose and secure with the hose clips.
Secure the engine breather hose bracket to the
Refit the right and left hand side panels DP
